column2: In the light of the above  principle, having considered the  submissions

made  by  both  parties,  this  Court  issues  an 
interim  relief  staying  further

proceedings  until  hearing  and 
final  determination  of this  application  as
prayed  for in Paragraph (4) of the prayer in the Petition.
JUDGE OF THE COURT OF APPEAL
JUDGE OF THE COURT OF APPEAL
